gameInfo.name: Match the Note
gameInfo.instructions: Look at the note on the screen. Identify which letter corresponds with the note.

gameInfo.name: Perfect Pitch
gameInfo.instructions: Listen to the note carefully. Identify which letter corresponds with the note.

gameInfo.name: Speed Playing
gameInfo.instructions: A note will be shown on the screen. Quickly play the correct note. The next note will appear right after.
